fairwayindependentmc:
{
        "About": "Fairway Independent Mortgage Corporation is a mortgage lender focused on providing exceptional customer service, personalized attention, and comprehensive support through every step of the loan process, from application to closing and beyond. They strive to be a trusted mortgage advisor.",
        "Mission": "Fairway Independent Mortgage Corporation is committed to securing great rates and loan options for customers while ensuring some of the fastest turn times in the industry. They aim to deliver satisfaction and earn trust by consistently exceeding expectations.",
        "Products": [
            "Mortgage Loan Options",
            "Affordable Housing Options",
            "VA Mortgage Loans",
            "Fixed- and Adjustable-rate Mortgage Options",
            "Renovation Loans",
            "Grants and Forgivable Second Loans"
        ],
        "Pricing": null,
        "Customers": "Fairway serves a diverse range of customers, including first-time homebuyers, veterans, and individuals eligible for state housing programs. They collaborate with organizations such as Habitat for Humanity, Hunger Task Force of Wisconsin, and the Brewers Community Foundation.",
        "Testimonials": [
            {"name": "Shannon", "testimonial": "Very efficient and helpful. Entire process was smooth and coordinated with all parties.", "location": "Beaufort, SC"},
            {"name": "David", "testimonial": "Shane made the whole process easy to understand and very smooth.", "location": "Eau Claire, WI"},
            {"name": "Mario", "testimonial": "The experience was fast, easy and helpful. I recommend Fairway to all my friends and family.", "location": "Nederland, TX"},
            {"name": "Marcia", "testimonial": "Steve took the time to establish a rapport with me and was very friendly and helpful throughout the whole process.", "location": "Surprise, AZ"},
            {"name": "May", "testimonial": "Susan was patient with my questions and did a thorough job explaining things to me.", "location": "Framingham, MA"},
            {"name": "Carter", "testimonial": "Positive and encouraging experience for first-time buyers.", "location": "Los Angeles, CA"},
            {"name": "Natalie", "testimonial": "Marshall was amazing! Made my experience buying my first home a breeze.", "location": "Tampa, FL"},
            {"name": "Sequoia", "testimonial": "They always answered questions when I asked and worked with me through all of it.", "location": "Clayton, AL"},
            {"name": "Emmanuel", "testimonial": "The customer service Nicole and Mauri provided was always excellent and professional.", "location": "Jackson, GA"},
            {"name": "Dakota", "testimonial": "Tom was phenomenal throughout the entire process. He was very responsive and knowledgeable.", "location": "Merrimack, NH"}
        ],
        "Industries & Segments": [
            "Mortgage Lending",
            "Home Buying",
            "Veteran Financing",
            "Affordable Housing",
            "Community Service"
        ]
    }

mcgriff:
{
  "About": "McGriff provides insurance and risk management solutions focused on clients' priorities and what they value most.",
  "Mission": "McGriff solves for protecting valuable assets and identifying risks to find creative insurance solutions.",
  "Products": [
    "McGriff Prescription Discount Card",
    "Personal Insurance",
    "Business Insurance",
    "Auto & Transportation Insurance",
    "Commercial Property Insurance",
    "Executive Risk Insurance",
    "CarePlus Mobile Health"
  ],
  "Pricing": null,
  "Customers": null,
  "Testimonials": [
    {
      "name": "Rachel Baldwin",
      "role": "teammate",
      "testimonial": "When an EF-2 tornado touched down in Greensboro, McGriff quickly responded to provide relief for our community. We also made care packages and walked door to door in the hardest hit areas to deliver food and a smiling face to folks who needed it most."
    },
    {
      "name": "Fran Harris",
      "role": "teammate",
      "testimonial": "Military Missions in Action is an organization focused on providing all types of housing items to previously homeless Veterans. Serving with this group as a volunteer allowed me show appreciation and respect for those that have sacrificed for our country. It was a rewarding experience and I look forward to future opportunities to volunteer with this organization."
    },
    {
      "name": "Dorie Liucci",
      "role": "teammate",
      "testimonial": "In 2020, we focused on remote, socially distanced activities due to COVID-19. For example, we packed over 750 lunch kits for Kids' Meals, which delivers lunches to children under age 6 in the Houston area. When we delivered the lunch kits, they expressed how grateful they were for our contribution, since the number of children in their program has nearly doubled during the pandemic. Even when we're physically distanced, we can still work together to make a difference in our community."
    }
  ],
  "Industries & Segments": [
    "Transportation",
    "Commercial Property",
    "Executive, Professional, Cyber, and Transactional Risk"
  ]
}

razorrank:
{"About": "Razor Rank is a premier Digital Marketing agency focused on serving the needs of many different types of companies seeking greater visibility online through a variety of marketing channels. They provide expert solutions and integrated resources for clients seeking superior service and expert advice designed to increase online visibility, traffic, lead generation, and revenue.",
"Mission": "Our mission is to exceed your expectations. Whether your business is a complex ecommerce platform or a small-to-medium sized business, our team provides the highest level of communication, and treats your business as it were our own.",
"Products": null,
"Pricing": null,
"Customers": "Razor Rank serves some of the largest brand names in the country and many medium and smaller-sized companies. Jason Campbell has led optimization for companies such as Toys\"R\"Us, Dick's Sporting Goods, Orbitz, Avon, Belk Department Stores, Neiman Marcus, Fossil, Gap Inc.",
"Testimonials": [
    {"text": "I can comfortably say that Razor Rank is one of the best partners I've been lucky enough to work with. The engagement met the goals and expectations of the internal team, leading to an ongoing relationship. Razor Rank provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and thorough.", "name": "Craig Madden", "role": "SVP eCommerce, Propper International"},
    {"text": "Razor Rank truly embodies the meaning of partner in everything they do. After a global website relaunch, SEO did not tumble and organic revenue didn't drop off... it started growing. The team at Razor Rank was very easy to communicate with, share ideas and strategize with.", "name": "Ryan Jeffrey", "role": "Digital Marketing Manager, Maui Jim"},
    {"text": "They weren't just order-takers, they were partners that could advise of strategy. Over the course of a few months, the team's work catalyzed a 500% increase in qualified leads, a 35% decrease in bounce rate, and a 50% increase in total visitors. Their design capabilities proved to be comparable to major players in the industry.", "name": "Carl Beauregard", "role": "SVP Marketing, Coronet"},
    {"text": "They've been, without a doubt, the best partner that I've ever come across. The law firm's organic traffic has doubled for personal injury, and we're ranking number one for over 100 targeted keywords. Razor Rank has produced excellent results, they consistently over-deliver and exceed expectations.", "name": "Dan Brian", "role": "Director Digital Marketing, Personal Injury Law Firm"},
    {"text": "They've taken the time to fully understand our very complicated business model and make accurate recommendations. We has seen improvement in our organic traffic, conversion rate, and SEO rankings. Proactivity in providing recommendations is a hallmark of their work.", "name": "Christine Craig", "role": "VP Sales & Marketing, Bramble Berry"},
    {"text": "As an interim CMO for Private Equity, I use Razor Rank as my go-to team for organic and paid search. The companies I work with are big brands who expect real results. I can count on Razor Rank to perform at 100% and bring my clients the results they need. I rely on them, and they never let me down.", "role": null}
],
"Industries & Segments": "Razor Rank focuses on e-commerce retailers, law firms, home services companies, HVAC companies, software companies, and other businesses that rely on lead generation."
}

        "testimonial": "We keep a sharp focus on innovation, service delivery, mentorship, and training so we can deliver solutions that create long-term value for our clients and make a strong impact in communities."
      },

        "name": "KENNETH LIU",
        "role": "SR. SOFTWARE ENGINEER",
